title: Heal Me Daddy
description: Can two brothers work together to heal the pain of a woman who swore she’d never love again?Headed to an isolated cabin to try to work on their fractured relationship, Doc and his brother run into a spot of trouble. Their savior is an unlikely one, a Little with a shield so thick it will take both of them working together to penetrate it.Caley isn’t interested in the real world. She much prefers to live through the stories in her head. At least then, she’s guaranteed a Happy-Ever-After.She’s lost everyone she ever loved. She’s not interested in risking her heart again. Not even to two men whose sweet promises fill her heart and whose hot looks stir her body.And whose loving, protective, possessive Daddy sides call to her Little.Warning: contains one grouchy alpha male, his protective brother and a Little who will bring them both to their knees. This book is about consenting adults and contains sexy scenes, spanking and MFM. If that offends please do not purchase. MFM.
author: Laylah Roberts
